title.0: Every day we look through the data from the biggest crypto exchanges to collect the most important stat about cryptos

main_text.0:
Top gainers

  • {binance_top_gain_name}: {binance_top_gain_price}$, {binance_top_gain_price_change}%, Volume 24h {binance_top_gain_vol}$ (via Binance)
